name: Noema
description: Schema-enforcing communication between AI agents via Noema proxy. Enables secure, validated data exchange with automatic encoding of untrusted content to prevent prompt injection.

proxyUrl.description: URL of the Noema proxy server

token.description: Authentication token for the Noema proxy

role.description: Agent role: 'requester' to request data, 'provider' to serve requests, 'both' for full participation

subscriptions.description: Agent IDs to subscribe to (provider/both roles only). Filters which requests this agent sees.
